title: The Veggie Grill
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Fast food, Take-out, Catering
description: An all-vegan cafe chain with a casual, modern feel and a bright decor. This location opened April 2013. Offers a variety of veggie burgers and sandwiches, hot plates, plus salads, sweet potato fries, kids menu, and desserts. Order and pay at counter and staff brings to your table. Parking is located behind the building on Rubio Ave in a paid parking lot, which, at busy times, is valet; first hour is free with validation. Street parking is very limited.
